channel.title: How do you restart server,and reset NPC's?
channel.description:
Hello,
I don't know the command to restart my server,and the command to reset npc's.Could someone please tell me how.I need to know how because on my server it sometimes lags,but it does rarely,and people say reset npc's or restart server,and I tell them that I don't know how and they get all mad,so please tell me the commands to restart server and reset npc's please.
Thanks, verycool

item.title: How do you restart server,and reset NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

::update seconds
And delete npc’s from autospawn.cfg files.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you restart server,and reset NPC's?
